title: Cray Compiler Discovery on Tulip

labels.name: triage
labels.description: The issue needs to be prioritized

body:
<!-- Explain, in a clear and concise way, the command you ran and the result you were trying to achieve.
Example: "I ran `spack find` to list all the installed packages and ..." -->

### Steps to reproduce the issue

```console
$ module load cce/12.0.0.248
$ spack compiler find
==> Added 1 new compiler to /home/users/coe62716/.spack/cray/compilers.yaml
    cce@12.0.0.248
==> Compilers are defined in the following files:
    /home/users/____/.spack/cray/compilers.yaml
$ spack compiler info cce@12.0.0.248
cce@12.0.0.248:
        paths:
                cc = cc
                cxx = CC
                f77 = ftn
                fc = ftn
        modules  = ['PrgEnv-cray', 'cce/12.0.0.248']
        operating system  = rhel8
$ spack install zlib %cce@12.0.0.248
==> Installing zlib-1.2.11-blm5td5gwhpmqn3vnlwzojnnpflyiekn
==> No binary for zlib-1.2.11-blm5td5gwhpmqn3vnlwzojnnpflyiekn found: installing from source
==> Error: CompilerAccessError: Compiler 'cce@12.0.0.248' has executables that are missing or are not executable: ['CC', 'ftn', 'ftn']

/home/users/coe62716/workspace/spack/lib/spack/spack/build_environment.py:863, in _setup_pkg_and_run:
        860        tb_string = traceback.format_exc()
        861
        862        # build up some context from the offending package so we can
  >>    863        # show that, too.
        864        package_context = get_package_context(tb)
        865
        866        logfile = None
```

Once I add the compilers to `~/.spack/cray/compilers.yaml`, it all works fine:
```console
$ spack install zlib %cce@12.0.0.248
==> Installing zlib-1.2.11-blm5td5gwhpmqn3vnlwzojnnpflyiekn
==> No binary for zlib-1.2.11-blm5td5gwhpmqn3vnlwzojnnpflyiekn found: installing from source
==> Using cached archive: /home/users/coe62716/workspace/spack/var/spack/cache/_source-cache/archive/c3/c3e5e9fdd5004dcb542feda5ee4f0ff0744628baf8ed2dd5d66f8ca1197cb1a1.tar.gz
==> zlib: Executing phase: 'install'
[+] /home/users/coe62716/workspace/spack/opt/spack/cray-rhel8-zen/cce-12.0.0.248/zlib-1.2.11-blm5t
```

### Error Message

<!-- If Spack reported an error, provide the error message. If it did not report an error but the output appears incorrect, provide the incorrect output. If there was no error message and no output but the result is incorrect, describe how it does not match what you expect. -->
```console
$ spack --debug --stacktrace install zlib %cce@12.0.0.248
lib/spack/spack/installer.py:1057 ==> [2020-12-12-11:07:40.377277] Installing zlib-1.2.11-blm5td5gwhpmqn3vnlwzojnnpflyiekn
lib/spack/spack/installer.py:271 ==> [2020-12-12-11:07:40.733855] No binary for zlib-1.2.11-blm5td5gwhpmqn3vnlwzojnnpflyiekn found: installing from source
lib/spack/spack/util/executable.py:162 ==> [2020-12-12-11:07:39.846884] '/bin/bash' '--norc' '--noprofile' '-lc' 'echo $CRAY_CPU_TARGET'
lib/spack/spack/platforms/cray.py:154 ==> [2020-12-12-11:07:39.865758] default to front-end architecture
lib/spack/spack/cmd/__init__.py:122 ==> [2020-12-12-11:07:39.923781] Imported install from built-in commands
lib/spack/spack/config.py:907 ==> [2020-12-12-11:07:39.926296] Reading config file /home/users/coe62716/workspace/spack/etc/spack/defaults/config.yaml
lib/spack/spack/cmd/__init__.py:122 ==> [2020-12-12-11:07:39.959596] Imported install from built-in commands
lib/spack/spack/config.py:907 ==> [2020-12-12-11:07:39.962317] Reading config file /home/users/coe62716/workspace/spack/etc/spack/defaults/repos.yaml
lib/spack/spack/config.py:907 ==> [2020-12-12-11:07:40.057351] Reading config file /home/users/coe62716/workspace/spack/etc/spack/defaults/packages.yaml
lib/spack/spack/config.py:907 ==> [2020-12-12-11:07:40.103319] Reading config file /home/users/coe62716/.spack/cray/compilers.yaml
lib/spack/spack/util/executable.py:162 ==> [2020-12-12-11:07:40.226001] '/bin/bash' '--norc' '--noprofile' '-lc' 'echo $CRAY_CPU_TARGET'
lib/spack/spack/platforms/cray.py:154 ==> [2020-12-12-11:07:40.232510] default to front-end architecture
lib/spack/spack/spec.py:2394 ==> [2020-12-12-11:07:40.245193] Ordered hashes [zlib]: zlib/0/e93f7400712c2814905815204dadbdebcb91dc77dd586f60cbc82efa102fb539
lib/spack/spack/database.py:362 ==> [2020-12-12-11:07:40.246784] DATABASE LOCK TIMEOUT: 3s
lib/spack/spack/database.py:366 ==> [2020-12-12-11:07:40.247024] PACKAGE LOCK TIMEOUT: No timeout
lib/spack/spack/installer.py:1333 ==> [2020-12-12-11:07:40.265129] Initializing the build queue from the build requests
lib/spack/spack/installer.py:976 ==> [2020-12-12-11:07:40.265315] Initializing the build queue for zlib
lib/spack/spack/installer.py:2009 ==> [2020-12-12-11:07:40.266438] Processing dependencies for zlib-1.2.11-blm5td5gwhpmqn3vnlwzojnnpflyiekn: ('build', 'link', 'run')
lib/spack/spack/database.py:461 ==> [2020-12-12-11:07:40.368358] Removing failure marking for zlib
lib/spack/spack/installer.py:1339 ==> [2020-12-12-11:07:40.369886] Ensure all dependencies know all dependents across specs
lib/spack/spack/installer.py:921 ==> [2020-12-12-11:07:40.371026] Acquiring a write lock on zlib-1.2.11-blm5td5gwhpmqn3vnlwzojnnpflyiekn with timeout 1e-09
lib/spack/spack/stage.py:312 ==> [2020-12-12-11:07:40.375708] Creating stage lock spack-stage-zlib-1.2.11-blm5td5gwhpmqn3vnlwzojnnpflyiekn
lib/spack/spack/installer.py:383 ==> [2020-12-12-11:07:40.377476] Searching for binary cache of zlib-1.2.11-blm5td5gwhpmqn3vnlwzojnnpflyiekn
lib/spack/spack/config.py:907 ==> [2020-12-12-11:07:40.378401] Reading config file /home/users/coe62716/workspace/spack/etc/spack/defaults/mirrors.yaml
lib/spack/spack/binary_distribution.py:1331 ==> [2020-12-12-11:07:40.732461] Did not find cray-rhel8-zen-cce-11.0.1.28-zlib-1.2.11-blm5td5gwhpmqn3vnlwzojnnpflyiekn.spec.yaml on https://spack-llnl-mirror.s3-us-west-2.amazonaws.com/build_cache/cray-rhel8-zen-cce-12.0.0.248-zlib-1.2.11-blm5td5gwhpmqn3vnlwzojnnpflyiekn.spec.yaml
  Download failed: HTTP Error 404: Not Found
lib/spack/spack/error.py:55 ==> [2020-12-12-11:07:41.260228] Error: CompilerAccessError: Compiler 'cce@11.0.1.28' has executables that are missing or are not executable: ['CC', 'ftn', 'ftn']

/home/users/coe62716/workspace/spack/lib/spack/spack/build_environment.py:863, in _setup_pkg_and_run:
        860        tb_string = traceback.format_exc()
        861
        862        # build up some context from the offending package so we can
  >>    863        # show that, too.
        864        package_context = get_package_context(tb)
        865
        866        logfile = None


Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/home/users/coe62716/workspace/spack/lib/spack/spack/build_environment.py", line 846, in _setup_pkg_and_run
    context=context)
  File "/home/users/coe62716/workspace/spack/lib/spack/spack/build_environment.py", line 730, in setup_package
    set_compiler_environment_variables(pkg, env)
  File "/home/users/coe62716/workspace/spack/lib/spack/spack/build_environment.py", line 216, in set_compiler_environment_variables
    compiler.verify_executables()
  File "/home/users/coe62716/workspace/spack/lib/spack/spack/compiler.py", line 333, in verify_executables
    raise CompilerAccessError(self, missing)
spack.compiler.CompilerAccessError: Compiler 'cce@12.0.0.248' has executables that are missing or are not executable: ['CC', 'ftn', 'ftn']
lib/spack/spack/installer.py:1263 ==> [2020-12-12-11:07:41.260584] Flagging zlib-1.2.11-blm5td5gwhpmqn3vnlwzojnnpflyiekn as failed: CompilerAccessError: Compiler 'cce@11.0.1.28' has executables that are missing or are not executable: ['CC', 'ftn', 'ftn']
lib/spack/spack/main.py:765 ==> [2020-12-12-11:07:41.265682] ChildError: CompilerAccessError: Compiler 'cce@12.0.0.248' has executables that are missing or are not executable: ['CC', 'ftn', 'ftn']
```

### Information on your system

* **Spack:** 0.16.0-44-5c623b03b
* **Python:** 3.6.8
* **Platform:** cray-rhel8-zen
* **Concretizer:** original

### Additional information

Possible duplicate of #17301?

CPU info: AMD EPYC 7601 32-Core Processor

<!-- These boxes can be checked by replacing [ ] with [x] or by clicking them after submitting the issue. -->
- [x] I have run `spack debug report` and reported the version of Spack/Python/Platform
- [x] I have searched the issues of this repo and believe this is not a duplicate
- [x] I have run the failing commands in debug mode and reported the output

If you want to ask a question about the tool (how to use it, what it can currently do, etc.), try the `#general` channel on our Slack first. We have a welcoming community and chances are you'll get your reply faster and without opening an issue.
